author: tienna
title: Cardano Technical hub in Vietnamese
description: New users may only need access to a one-stop technical hub that covers from fundamental to advanced technical information about Cardano
solution: Bring a unique portal to Vietnam Community where they can find all technical information to get started with Cardano
experience: We are full-stack developers, funded proposers, SPOs, Eastern Townhall moderators, blockchain tech-savvies.
